author: ohraemez
content: can you please execute this command `sudo apt install -y git gcc g++ make cmake pkg-config llvm-dev libclang-dev clang` these are the lighthouse dependencies, i think your guide is missing those. seamonkeys problem is not applicable to you (you are building lighthouse, the problem was with nimbus).

author: thekkiidd
content: Thanks, will give it a go. BTW, is there a better guide that I should follow that's more complete? Thanks

author: ohraemez
content: I think it's the most noob friendly guide we have so far. If something is missing or is unclear just tell<@!102952036382830592> so he can improve the guide ðŸ™‚
